title: Smart Data Models - ExcSK
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Slovakian Excitation System Model.  UEL and secondary voltage control are included in this model. When this model is used, there cannot be a separate underexcitation limiter or VAr controller model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcSK

efdmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage clipping limit (Efdmax). Default: 0.0

efdmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage clipping limit (Efdmin). Default: 0.0

emax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum field voltage output (Emax).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

emin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum field voltage output (Emin).  Typical Value = -20. Default: 0.0

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Parameter of underexcitation limit (K1).  Typical Value = 0.1364. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Parameter of underexcitation limit (K2).  Typical Value = -0.3861. Default: 0.0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller gain (Kc).  Typical Value = 70. Default: 0.0

kce.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier regulation factor (Kce).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter internal reactance (Kd).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kgob.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. P controller gain (Kgob).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller gain (Kp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kqi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller gain of integral component (Kqi).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kqob.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate of rise of the reactive power (Kqob). Default: 0.0

kqp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller gain (Kqp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

nq.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Dead band of reactive power (nq).  Determines the range of sensitivity.  Typical Value = 0.001. Default: 0.0

qconoff.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Secondary voltage control state (Qc_on_off). true = secondary voltage control is ON false = secondary voltage control is OFF. Typical Value = false. Default: False

qz.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Desired value (setpoint) of reactive power, manual setting (Qz). Default: 0.0

remote.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector to apply automatic calculation in secondary controller model. true = automatic calculation is activated false = manual set is active; the use of desired value of reactive power (Qz) is required. Typical Value = true. Default: False

sbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Apparent power of the unit (Sbase).  Unit = MVA.  Typical Value = 259. Default: 0.0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller phase lead time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of gain block (Te).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

ti.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PI controller phase lead time constant (Ti).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

tp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage transducer time constant (Tr).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

uimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum error (Uimax).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

uimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum error (UImin).  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

urmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum controller output (URmax).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

urmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum controller output (URmin).  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

vtmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum terminal voltage input (Vtmax).  Determines the range of voltage dead band.  Typical Value = 1.05. Default: 0.0

vtmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum terminal voltage input (Vtmin).  Determines the range of voltage dead band.  Typical Value = 0.95. Default: 0.0

yp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum output (Yp).  Minimum output = 0.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0
